issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Add support for writing sliced arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8424](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8424). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The initial Parquet writer does not consider array offsets. This is to ensure that we add tests for offsets
